data.description: List of product option/variant records for this page.

IShoppingMallAiProductSnapshot.IUpdate,[.description: A paginated list of product options (variants) associated with products and SKUs for catalog, analytics, or inventory reporting. Standard for multi-page records.

shopping_mall_ai_product_category_id.description: Main category reference (FK to shopping_mall_ai_product_categories.id). Changes the product's category assignment. Optional for updates; only provided when changing the category.

title.description: (Optional) New product title for this product. Used for renaming and catalog refreshes.

price.description: (Optional) Updated base price. Must be a positive decimal if provided.

status.description: (Optional) Updated product status in the catalog lifecycle.

sku.description: (Optional) Updated SKU, must remain unique for this seller.

IShoppingMallAiProduct.ICreate,[object O.description: Type for product updates (shopping_mall_ai_products). All fields are optional; provide only changed properties. Product ID and seller context are taken from the endpoint/path.

point_type.description: Type of mileage event - may be updated only for correction scenarios, never to change fundamental business logic. Suggested values: accrual, redemption, adjustment.

amount.description: Modified point amount. Changes allowed only for admin corrections. Negative for redemptions, positive for accrual.

oneOf.description: Optional updated event description. Used for audit, compliance, or admin notes. Nullable.
Optional updated event description. Used for audit, compliance, or admin notes. Nullable.

details.description: Optional updated event description. Used for audit, compliance, or admin notes. Nullable.

IShoppingMallAiMileagePoint.ICreate,[obj.description:
Update payload for a mileage/loyalty point event (shopping_mall_ai_mileage_points).

Allows only admin-authorized corrections for audit/compliance; not intended for standard business flows.

oneOf.description: Page number for pagination. Optional, defaults to 1 if omitted.
Page number for pagination. Optional, defaults to 1 if omitted.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Optional, defaults to 1 if omitted.

oneOf.description: Maximum records per page, used for pagination controls. Optional, defaults to system policy.
Maximum records per page, used for pagination controls. Optional, defaults to system policy.

limit.description: Maximum records per page, used for pagination controls. Optional, defaults to system policy.

oneOf.description: Filter files by original file name supplied by uploader. Optional.
Filter files by original file name supplied by uploader. Optional.

original_name.description: Filter files by original file name supplied by uploader. Optional.

oneOf.description: Filter by file extension (e.g., 'jpg', 'pdf'). Optional.
Filter by file extension (e.g., 'jpg', 'pdf'). Optional.
Filter by official MIME type (e.g., 'image/png'). Optional.
Filter by official MIME type (e.g., 'image/png'). Optional.

mime_type.description: Filter by official MIME type (e.g., 'image/png'). Optional.

oneOf.description: Search by actor type (customer, seller, admin, system). Optional.
Search by actor type (customer, seller, admin, system). Optional.

actor_type.description: Search by actor type (customer, seller, admin, system). Optional.

oneOf.description: Filter by uploader's UUID. Optional.
Filter by uploader's UUID. Optional.
Query for files uploaded after this ISO-8601 date. Optional.
Query for files uploaded after this ISO-8601 date. Optional.

created_from.description: Query for files uploaded after this ISO-8601 date. Optional.

oneOf.description: Query for files uploaded before this ISO-8601 date. Optional.
Query for files uploaded before this ISO-8601 date. Optional.

created_to.description: Query for files uploaded before this ISO-8601 date. Optional.

oneOf.description: Search for deleted or active files. Optional; false means only undeleted.
Search for deleted or active files. Optional; false means only undeleted.

deleted.description: Search for deleted or active files. Optional; false means only undeleted.

IPageIShoppingMallAiFile,[object Object].description: Filtering, sorting, and pagination controls used for advanced queries to the shopping_mall_ai_files table. Includes all major file metadata as available and supports powerful admin/compliance monitoring workflows.

IShoppingMallAiProductBundle.ICreate,[ob.description: Schema for updating an existing product bundle in the shopping mall catalog. All updatable atomic fields from shopping_mall_ai_product_bundles are included. Only fields permitted by business rules for update are present. Patch semantics: all fields optional, but at least one field should be supplied per update. Operations are fully audited. Linked objects and relations (such as products in bundle) are not updated here - use dedicated APIs for complex operations.

title.description: Updated name of the product bundle. Optional unless changing display information.

description.description: Updated overview/description of the bundle. Optional.

price.description: Updated explicit price for the bundle.

active.description: Whether the bundle is currently active/visible.

quantity.description: Updated quantity for the cart item. A positive integer required by shopping cart logic, referencing the latest desired count after adjustment, and subject to inventory validation for both add and update cases.

oneOf.description: Optionally update the product option (variant/SKU) associated with the cart item. Useful for users switching product size, color, or variant before checkout. If the item has no variant or should revert to base product, set to null.

Optionally update the product option (variant/SKU) associated with the cart item. Useful for users switching product size, color, or variant before checkout. If the item has no variant or should revert to base product, set to null.

shopping_mall_ai_product_option_id.description: Optionally update the product option (variant/SKU) associated with the cart item. Useful for users switching product size, color, or variant before checkout. If the item has no variant or should revert to base product, set to null.

IShoppingMallAiCartItem.ICreate,[object.description: Update schema for cart item modification. Permits changing quantity and swapping product variant/option (SKU) in-place within a cart. Complies with cart mutation requirements for e-commerce platforms, preserving item state and tracking changes for analysis. Business logic guarantees only fields allowed for cart edit are present; product and parent cart references are immutable in updates.

shopping_mall_ai_product_id.description: Target product ID being reviewed. Must match shopping_mall_ai_products.id. Required.

shopping_mall_ai_order_id.description: Order ID used to verify purchase for review eligibility. Must match shopping_mall_ai_orders.id. Required.

rating.description: Integer score between 1 and 5 (typically), for product evaluation. Must pass validation (min/max business rule).

body.description: Free-text comment provided by customer. Body of the review for display, moderation, QA, and analytics.

IShoppingMallAiReview,[object Object].description: Request DTO for creating (registering) a new product review. Contains only safe, user-supplied fields. All IDs are validated server-side; customer_id is set from authentication and never taken from client in request. Compliant with security rules—prevents forging user identity. Used exclusively in POST for review creation.

IShoppingAiContentAudit,[object Object].description: Request structure for registering a new AI content audit scan result. Used to log detection events from the moderation service. All fields are required for audit and compliance. Must match the shopping_mall_ai_ai_content_audits table in field atomicity and naming.

content_type.description: Type of content audited (see type property of IShoppingAiContentAudit).

content_id.description: ID of the specific content being audited.

violation_type.description: Type of violation as determined by the moderation AI.

action_suggested.description: Recommended admin action (e.g., review, block, accept).

audited_at.description: Audit event timestamp in ISO 8601 UTC format.

policy_code.description: Code identifying the business policy or compliance document being versioned/changed.

policy_version.description: Changed-to version number of the policy (e.g., 'v1.2').

change_summary.description: Description of the change in this version, for audit and regulatory reporting.

approved_by.description: Unique identifier of the admin who approved this policy change.

approved_at.description: Timestamp for when approval occurred (ISO 8601 date-time).

oneOf.description: Previous policy version number. Null if this is the initial issue.
Previous policy version number. Null if this is the initial issue.

previous_version.description: Previous policy version number. Null if this is the initial issue.

IShoppingMallAiPolicyChange,[object Obje.description: Request structure for registering a new policy document version/change. Used when a new version of a business/compliance policy is approved in the system. Does not include primary key field; that is generated on insert.

filter.description: Optional search/filter criteria object for advanced BBS comment querying. Example fields include author, parent_id, created_at range, etc. Properties must reference real comment schema fields.

sort.description: Field to sort by (such as created_at or updated_at). Optional.

oneOf.description: Sort order (ascending or descending). Optional.
Sort order (ascending or descending). Optional.

page.description: Page number for paginated results. Optional; defaults to 1.

limit.description: Number of comments per page. Optional; default is 20, max is 100.

IPageIShoppingMallAiBbsComment,[object O.description: Request body for advanced/paginated search, filter, or sort for BBS comments. Fields allow granular targeting by author, parent, creation/update date, and thread participation for moderation or analytics. Follows schema-defined keys; invalid keys will result in 400 errors. Pagination keys page/limit follow IPage.IRequest.

pagination.description: Pagination information for the current result set.

data.description: List of order items for the current page.

IShoppingMallAiOrder.IUpdate,[object Obj.description: Paginated result for order items. Includes result page info and the items for that page.

oneOf.description: File ID (shopping_mall_ai_files.id) to attach. Set if attaching the base file. Null if using a media asset variant. Only one of file or media_asset should be set for each row.
File ID (shopping_mall_ai_files.id) to attach. Set if attaching the base file. Null if using a media asset variant. Only one of file or media_asset should be set for each row.

shopping_mall_ai_file_id.description: File ID (shopping_mall_ai_files.id) to attach. Set if attaching the base file. Null if using a media asset variant. Only one of file or media_asset should be set for each row.

oneOf.description: Media asset ID (shopping_mall_ai_media_assets.id) to attach. Used for thumbnail, preview, or other derivatives. Null if base file is used. Only one of file or media_asset may be set.
Media asset ID (shopping_mall_ai_media_assets.id) to attach. Used for thumbnail, preview, or other derivatives. Null if base file is used. Only one of file or media_asset may be set.

shopping_mall_ai_media_asset_id.description: Media asset ID (shopping_mall_ai_media_assets.id) to attach. Used for thumbnail, preview, or other derivatives. Null if base file is used. Only one of file or media_asset may be set.

target_type.description: Business object type string this file/asset is attached to (e.g., 'product', 'review', 'bbs_post'). Must match a supported target type in the platform.

target_id.description: UUID of the target business object being attached to, as identified by target_type.

attached_at.description: Date/time when the file is attached (RFC 3339). Serialized at time of new attachment creation.

IShoppingMallAiFileAttachment,[object Ob.description: Request body for creating a new file attachment record in the system. Links an uploaded file or asset variant to a business object, specifying type, target, file or asset reference, and precise attached time for audit traceability. Only one of the attachment reference fields (file or media asset) must be non-null per row.

id.description: Primary Key. Unique identifier of the AI product recommendation mapping.

shopping_mall_ai_product_id.description: Foreign key reference to the product for which this AI recommendation is made.

shopping_mall_ai_channel_id.description: Foreign key reference to the sales channel where this recommendation is surfaced.

metadata_json.description: Opaque metadata blob containing details about model reasoning, feature vectors, or recommendation rank/output details. Serialized as stringified JSON.

created_at.description: Record creation timestamp (audited for regulatory & analytics purposes). UTC ISO8601.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of last update of this recommendation mapping (audit/compliance). UTC ISO8601.

IShoppingMallAiAiRecommendation.IRequest.description: AI Recommendation mapping object. Represents the relationship between a product and a channel, including machine learning output metadata for explainability, compliance, and operational dashboards. All fields normalized as per database/ERD. No customer data.

IShoppingMallAiShipment.IRequest,[object.description: A paginated result set of shipment entities.

id.description: Primary Key. The unique identifier for the coupon event.

shopping_mall_ai_coupon_id.description: Foreign Key. References the coupon this event applies to (shopping_mall_ai_coupons.id).

oneOf.description: Optional Foreign Key. Customer involved in the coupon event, or null if not applicable (e.g., system/admin events).
Optional Foreign Key. Customer involved in the coupon event, or null if not applicable (e.g., system/admin events).

shopping_mall_ai_customer_id.description: Optional Foreign Key. Customer involved in the coupon event, or null if not applicable (e.g., system/admin events).

oneOf.description: Optional Foreign Key. Order associated with this coupon event, or null if not applicable.
Optional Foreign Key. Order associated with this coupon event, or null if not applicable.

shopping_mall_ai_order_id.description: Optional Foreign Key. Order associated with this coupon event, or null if not applicable.

oneOf.description: Optional Foreign Key. The actor performing/logging this event – could be a seller or admin, or null for system-initiated events.
Optional Foreign Key. The actor performing/logging this event – could be a seller or admin, or null for system-initiated events.

shopping_mall_ai_actor_id.description: Optional Foreign Key. The actor performing/logging this event – could be a seller or admin, or null for system-initiated events.

event_type.description: Type of coupon event for audit trail and business logic. Examples include 'issued', 'redeemed', 'expired', 'flagged', 'reviewed', etc.

occurred_at.description: Timestamp marking when the event occurred, represented as UTC ISO 8601 date-time.

oneOf.description: Optional business or compliance note explaining the event. May be null.
Optional business or compliance note explaining the event. May be null.

details.description: Optional business or compliance note explaining the event. May be null.

IShoppingMallAiCouponEvent.IRequest,[obj.description: Coupon event domain object capturing atomic events related to a coupon, including issuance, redemption, audit actions, and administrative changes. Atomic and 3NF-compliant, suitable for audit queries and business logic reporting.
